channel.title: Making a working run.bat and compiler
channel.description:
please note:this is my furst help secton. and i hope it might help you. if you have any questions please post at the bottom For some time now some of the new compilers havnt worked for me. then i discoverd a lost thread that had 1 for jdk v6.3 first step for compiler is to make a new text document. name it compiler.bat. htne put this code in it
@echo off echo Ghost's Simple Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" server pause
That will fix your compiler for the new jdk verson 6.3 Another problem i had was with my run.bat. I was trying to get a auto restarter that would work but i couldnt find any. You need to make a text document called run.bat and put thsi code in it
@echo off color 0a title ProjGhost pkz "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" server pause
and then you can start it up perfectly. if you want a working auto restarter goto this download site. http://www.megaupload.com/?d=C3TFU92D Credit to-Thomas121794, and 'Rich I hope you like This

item.title: Making a working run.bat and compiler
item.dc:creator: @ass_woop ass woop
item.description:
@ass_woop wrote:

You would not need to “make a new text document” because the people who are reading this have a compiler.bat and run.bat and they would need to right click and hit “edit” then delete everything there and paste that in.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a working run.bat and compiler

item.title: Making a working run.bat and compiler
item.dc:creator: @thomas121794 thomas121794
item.description:
@thomas121794 wrote:

please note:this is my furst help secton. and i hope it might help you. if you have any questions please post at the bottom

For some time now some of the new compilers havnt worked for me. then i discoverd a lost thread that had 1 for jdk v6.3

first step for compiler is to make a new text document. name it compiler.bat. htne put this code in it

@echo off echo Ghost's Simple Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" server pause

That will fix your compiler for the new jdk verson 6.3

Another problem i had was with my run.bat. I was trying to get a auto restarter that would work but i couldnt find any.

You need to make a text document called run.bat and put thsi code in it

@echo off color 0a title ProjGhost pkz "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" server pause

and then you can start it up perfectly.

if you want a working auto restarter goto this download site.

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=C3TFU92D

Credit to-Thomas121794, and 'Rich

I hope you like This

Read full topic
item.source: Making a working run.bat and compiler
